answers.answer: Same thing was happening to me so I was sent for a ultrasound and my baby was actually measuring 3 weeks smaller I just have extra amniotic fluid due to gestational diabetes
No it doesn't mean your baby is going to come early.

question: I went to the drs today and im 28 weeks  but im measuring 30 weeks. Is my lil boy trying to come early or is he just big?
title: measuring two weeks ahead
